description: Jack Duggan — Software Engineer building high-performance systems in C++ and exploring algorithms.

hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.p1: building high-performance systems and exploring the intersection of algorithms and real-world problems. Currently developing projects in C++ and studying computer science
hero.p2: Working on everything from operating systems to poker solvers and competitive programming. I care about writing efficient code, understanding fundamentals deeply, and continuous improvement.
hero.p3: When not coding, you'll find me in the pool playing water polo, strategizing over Magic: The Gathering, or at the poker table.

item_1.name: C++ Hash Map
item_1.description: A high performance hash map implementation, using a swisse table with SIMD accelerated probing

item_2.name: Order Book
item_2.description: Low-latency order book implementation in C++ with object pooling, cache-optimized data structures, and sub-microsecond matching.

item_3.name: Particle Swarm Optimizer
item_3.description: A multi-objective Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) implementation for finding optimal portfolio allocations using S&P 500 stock data

item_1.description: Designed algorithms to interpret and improve traffic flow. Used machine vision to effectively identify and load train carriages.

item_2.description: Modelled and built PCB to manage power and ensure uptime. Used partial-string matching algorithms to implement a safe one-way bridge.

linux.title: Linux
linux.description: System Administration, Shell Scripting, Performance Tuning
